attributes.action: Make the duplication and distribution of nude photos, without consent illegal
attributes.additional_details: This can affect the lives of young women and even young men. It can ruin jobs, relationships and can be linked to a string of mental health issues, even suicide. There’s a number of online sites that are specifically used for trading nudes and where there are certain individuals nudes being requested.
attributes.background: Change the laws around the sharing of nude images of adults. Make it illegal for nude/ partially nudes to be shared without consent. Also look to bad online nude trading sites

rejection.details:
It is already an offence to disclose a private sexual photograph or film without the consent of the individual who appears, if this is done with the intention of causing the individual distress: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2015/2/section/33/enacted

We could accept a petition calling for this offence to be amended so that it applies whether or not the perpetrator intended to cause distress to the victim.
